name: Pro PC Cleaner

screenshots.caption: For a Totally Fast and Amazingly Clean PC!

short_description:
Pro PC Cleaner allows the user to optimize the functionality of their computer in many ways. Our updated software identifies and repairs an incredible number of errors and problems, and has proven to be our most effective program yet.

Pro PC Cleaner identifies and repairs Windows Registry errors to optimize your PC. It removes unwanted files, duplicate files and useless data. Pro PC Cleaner cleans up the user's browsing history and old cookies that slow down your computer. It also deletes corrupted files, shuts down unnecessary processes, and improves the overall performance of the user's computer.

Free security tips.

This program is great for users experiencing crashes, freezes, and errors. It is perfect for users who download, shop, browse, or stream regularly from the internet. It is very easy to use for all who prefer a super fast computer, old or new. It is an excellent wait to maintain a clean and responsive system for all!
summary: For a Totally Fast and Amazingly Clean PC!
